Birthday Event

SHIELLA - GOLDEN JUBILEE

Year Location
2019 Bandung

“You are the dancing queen, young and sweet, only seventeen,” who doesn’t know The Dancing Queen by ABBA. A perfect song for Mrs. Shiella. Age is just a number, entering the age of 50, that didn’t stop her spirit and enthusiasm! Since the first meeting, Mrs. Shiella simply wanted a classic black and gold colour palette for her big sweet 50th birthday.

Adjusting to her preferences, we propose “magnificent” as the event theme and took the European Baroque architecture style for the decoration concept making it extra magnificent. The invited guests were entertained by the spectacular performances, live band, and disco time with 90s songs, making sure all were enjoying the moment while dancing and remembering the good old days.

DOCUMENTARIES
